drug_classes.title: Anticoagulants / antiplatelets
drug_classes.notes: Bleeding/clotting risk context.

drug_classes.title: Antihypertensives / BP-lowering agents
drug_classes.notes: Blood pressure effects and orthostatic risk context.

drug_classes.title: Glucose-lowering agents
drug_classes.notes: Hypoglycemia risk context; appetite/gastric effects context.

drug_classes.title: Thyroid hormone / thyroid-active meds
drug_classes.notes: Thyroid axis context.

drug_classes.title: CNS depressants / sedatives
drug_classes.notes: Sedation/respiratory depression and cognition context.

drug_classes.title: Stimulants / adrenergic agents
drug_classes.notes: Heart rate/BP and anxiety/insomnia context.

drug_classes.title: Serotonergic antidepressants
drug_classes.notes: Serotonin syndrome and mood effects context.

drug_classes.title: MAO inhibitors (MAOIs)
drug_classes.notes: Serotonin/catecholamine interaction context.

drug_classes.title: Immunosuppressants / immune-modulating drugs
drug_classes.notes: Immune modulation/infection risk context.

drug_classes.title: Corticosteroids
drug_classes.notes: Immune/metabolic and wound-healing context.

drug_classes.title: Antidiabetics (Insulin/GLP-1 and related)
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for diabetes medications (incretin/GLP-1 class, insulin and related). Educational only.

drug_classes.title: Thyroid hormone replacement
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for thyroid hormone replacement therapy. Educational only.

drug_classes.title: NSAIDs (ibuprofen/naproxen and related)
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs. Educational only.

drug_classes.title: SSRIs/SNRIs and other serotonergic agents
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for serotonergic antidepressants and agents. Educational only.

drug_classes.title: Stimulants (ADHD medications and related)
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for prescription stimulants. Educational only.

drug_classes.title: QT-prolonging agents
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for drugs associated with QT prolongation/torsades risk. Educational only.

drug_classes.title: MAO inhibitors (MAOIs)
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for monoamine oxidase inhibitors and notable MAOI-like agents. Educational only.

drug_classes.title: Androgens / anabolic steroids (TRT/AAS)
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for androgen/anabolic therapies. Educational only.

drug_classes.title: Antiarrhythmics (heart rhythm medications)
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for rhythm-control medications. Educational only.

drug_classes.title: Anti-infectives / antimicrobials (antibiotics, antivirals, antifungals)
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for anti-infective medications. Educational only.

drug_classes.title: Biologics / immunomodulators (immune-modifying therapies)
drug_classes.notes: Routing/labeling class for immune-modifying prescription therapies. Educational only.

drug_classes.title: Immune modulation / infection risk context
drug_classes.notes: Educational grouping for peptides that frequently appear in immune/infection discussions. Not a medication class.

drug_classes.title: Cardiovascular physiology / vasoactive peptide context
drug_classes.notes: Educational context grouping for endogenous or peptide-like agents involved in cardiovascular regulation (BP, volume, vascular tone). Not a medication class.

drug_classes.title: Endocrine axis modulation (HPT/HPA/HPG/GH context)
drug_classes.notes: Educational grouping for peptides/hormones that directly influence endocrine axes. Not a medication class.
